idea-plugin.name: Apero Translate strings
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful string translation plugin for IntelliJ-based IDEs (including Android Studio) that helps developers translate string resources using Google Generative AI.
Features: - Translate entire XML files to multiple languages using Google Generative AI (Gemini 2.5 Flash) - Add and translate individual strings with real-time AI translation - Batch translation with intelligent API usage and retry logic - Support for 25+ languages including Vietnamese, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and more - Automatic XML formatting and escaping with proper entity handling - Integration with project resource structure and auto-detection - Smart rate limiting and API key rotation for reliability - Configurable API keys with secure storage - Auto-filtering of qualifier folders (night, v29, land, hdpi...)
Perfect for developers who need to quickly localize their applications, especially Android developers working with string resources.
Author: Thanh Nguyen (thanhnguyen6702@gmail.com)
